```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE, warning = FALSE)
rootdir <- dirname(getwd())
```

### Load packages and data

```{r, message=FALSE, echo=FALSE, warning=FALSE}
library(tidyverse)
library(sf)
library(lfe)
library(AER)
library(ggnewscale)
library(cowplot)
library(stargazer)
library(sandwich)
library(readstata13)
library(rdrobust)
source(paste(rootdir, "/code/rdrobustr.r", sep = "")) ### rdrobust package with some minor adjustments
#devtools::install_github("mdgordo/dumbells",ref="master")
library(dumbells)
library(rdpower)
library(hdm)
library(boot)
library(parallel)
source(paste(rootdir, "/code/rdhelpers.r", sep = ""))

df.hh <- read_csv(paste(rootdir, "/data/processed/full_panel.csv", sep = ""), guess_max = 7500)

### drop hhs very far from border, otherwise pick up hhs on the other side 
df.hh <- filter(df.hh, food_consumption>0, total_income>0,
                abs(dist_2_seg1pt)<150) %>%
  mutate(wave2 = if_else(wave==2, 1, 0),
         wave3 = if_else(wave==3, 1, 0),
         seg2 = if_else(border14_segment==2, 1, 0),
         seg3 = if_else(border14_segment==3, 1, 0),
         migration_bin = if_else(n_migrants > 0, 1, 0)) %>%
  group_by(hhid) %>%
  mutate(lag_h = lag(home_value, order_by = wave))
```

Define vars

```{r, warning = FALSE}
placebos <- c("shake_pga", "high_caste", "age_hh", "highest_ed", "hhmembers",
              "class5", "class10", "always_lived_house", "always_lived_dist", "slope", "NGO_transfers", "non_quake_aid")
infravars <- c("time_to_school", "time_to_health", "time_to_market", "time_to_bank")
pricevars <- c("chicken_price", "rice_price", "lentil_price", "sugar_price", "mutton_price")
aidvars <- c("aid_cumulative_bin", "aid_cumulative", "reconstruction_aid_bin", "reconstruction_aid_cumulative")
mainvars <- c("food_consumption", "home_investment", "remittance_income", "liq_savings", "tot_savings", "total_income", "migration_bin")
secvars <- c("labor_income", "livestock_value", "business_investment", "cap_inputs", "school_costs", "health_costs",
             "work_aid_wages", "liq_savings", "tot_savings", "labor_supply", "days_ill")

### regression specs
dist.exclude = c("none", "slight"); k = "triangular"; vce = "hc1"
bvar = "dist_2_seg1pt"; fvar = "aid_cumulative_bin"

ctrls1 <- pdlvarselect("food_consumption", df = df.hh, dist.exclude = dist.exclude, k = k, vce = vce, fuzzy = fvar)
ctrls1

### first stage bandwidth
bws <- optbw(fvar, b = bvar, df = df.hh, fuzzy = FALSE, vars = "none", 
             dist.exclude = dist.exclude, k = k, vce = vce, ihs = FALSE)
h1 <- bws[1,1]; h1
b1 <- bws[1,3]; b1
saveRDS(h1, paste(rootdir, "/data/model_output/optbw.rds", sep = ""))
```

### Placebo checks - no controls - optimal bandwidths

```{r, warning = FALSE}
rdplacebo <- lapply(placebos[c(2:12)], regout, b = bvar, f = fvar, df = df.hh, 
                    dist.exclude = dist.exclude, vars = "none", k = k, vce = vce)

rdgazer(rdplacebo, dvlabs = str_replace_all(placebos[c(2:12)], "_", " "), 
        xlines = list(c("Wards", sapply(rdplacebo, function(x) length(unique(x$X[abs(x$X)<x$bws[2,1]]))))), type = "text")

rdprice <- lapply(c(pricevars, infravars), regout, b = bvar, f = fvar, df = df.hh,
                  dist.exclude = dist.exclude, vars = "none", k = k, vce = vce)
rdgazer(rdprice, dvlabs = str_replace_all(c(pricevars, infravars), "_", " "), 
        xlines = list(c("Wards", sapply(rdprice, function(x) length(unique(x$X[abs(x$X)<x$bws[2,1]]))))), type = "text")
```

severe <- st_union(filter(df.shp, designation == "severe"))
